title: Shi wo Utau Seiza
sinopse:
This volume contains 4 one-shots; the last 3 one-shots are part of a series titled "Kiri to Honoo to Satsujin to."

1. Shi wo Utau Seiza (Constellation that Sings Death)
2. Furimukeba Kiri (When the Fog Comes)
3. Honoo no Senritsu (Fire Starter)
4. Toki no Yakata (The Castle)
